document.full_text: analysts said they were doubtful that the changes, coming a day after president bashar al-assad pointedly refused to make concessions, would amount to more than window dressing.
document.title: syria offers changes before renewed protests
lines_and_colors: analysts said they were doubtful that the changes, coming a day after president bashar al-assad pointedly refused to make concessions, would amount to more than window dressing.
